(:action remove ; Remove an item from a location and update its status
:parameters (?item - object ?location - place)
:precondition (and (in ?item ?location) (not (removed ?item ?location)))
:effect (and (removed ?item ?location))

(:action create ; Create a new entity or status based on specific conditions
:parameters (?creator - agent ?item - resource ?location - place)
:precondition (and (available ?creator) (at ?item ?location) (not (created ?item)))
:effect (created ?item))
